amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to develop and publish an action plan for improving the vocational rehabilitation services and assistance provided by the Department of Veterans Affairs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2801 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2801 proposed by Senator Tester for Senator Brown to Amendment SA 2763.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2801 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2801 proposed by Senator Tester for Senator Brown to Amendment SA 2763.
